projects.name: Halli's BookShop - E-commerce store
projects.description: Halli's BookShop is Single page Application Ecommerce store where users can search and filter books add products to their Cart, Checkout and buy books using Stripe Gateway. they can also sell books, manage their products, track their sells and update their personal informations from a dashboard.

projects.name: ChatPals - Chat Application
projects.description: ChatPals is a Single page Chat Web-Application with real-time ui updates where you can find friends, receive friend requests, manage your friends list and chat.

projects.name: ft_transcendence - Rest-Api
projects.description: ft_transcendence is a restful api with MVC architectural pattern built using Nest.js that manages OAuth 2.0(42 authentication) and Two-Factor(OTP) authentication, input validation, image upload, real-time friend requests, direct-messages chat, chat channels creation with role based membership. server and database each runs in a dedicated docker container.

projects.name: ChatPals Server - Rest-Api
projects.description: ChatPals Api is a restful api with MVC architectural pattern built using Nodes.js that manages OAuth 2.0(google Oauth) and JWT(access and refresh tokens) authentication, input validation, image upload, real-time friend requests and direct-messages chat.
